response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, but based on our extensive research and the feedback from previous clients, we believe it is priced fairly at $900,000.

This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring that we receive a fair return for our investment. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring you significant benefits. If you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
